attributes.action: Stop homelessness and provide night shelters in every town
attributes.additional_details: Why not have a walk around your town centre and instead of just walking past the homeless actually take a minute of your time to have a conversation with them, realise that any person can become homeless, all it takes is a loss of a job and then to have your house repossessed.
attributes.background: Have a look at the homeless people in your town and take a minute to think about the bad risks they are taking everyday and the danger what is around them, put your self in their position, could you handle their day to day life's?
